level.heading: Confidentiality of records.
level.text: The provisions of §§ 16-2332 and 16-2333 shall apply to all juvenile case records and juvenile social records as defined therein which are created pursuant to the proceedings under this subchapter.

level.heading: Legislative History of Law 2-22
level.text: For legislative history of D.C. Law 2-22, see Historical and Statutory Notes following § 16-2301.

level.heading: Legislative History of Law 12-81
level.text: For legislative history of D.C. Law 12-81, see Historical and Statutory Notes following § 16-2301.
